Lunarpine turned to avoid the blast but still took most of the blast 
in the chest. A glancing blow that sent pain through every sensor in 
his body, he somehow managed to stay on his feet glaring at 
Deathscythe. "You're tye foolish one, as we speak at least a dozen 
Maximals are on their way. I'm a recon bot, you think I'd come out 
here without backup?" he held up his left arm, trying not to show the 
pain he was in."Shadow Wing, move in full force.It's a direct link, 
go ahead and scan, by the time you find the right freq, it'll be to 
late."

OOC Don't respond Logo, Lunarpines comm is damaged, he is bluffing.
OOC2 Yanosh@a I've been having problems with my Email, I'll try to 
send info. again.
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> DeathScythe chuckles, taking a step back. This Maximal was 
obvioustly hoping 
> for his pride to take over. DeathScythe, being an assassin, didn't 
care which 
> way he killed his victim, as long as the bot is dead.
> 
> "Foolish Maximal. I don't care how you die," he says in his deadly 
whisper as 
> he fires his gun again, the bolt heading for Lunarpine's chest.
